message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll love it. Would you like to make an offer on it?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I have to make a living. I can do $140, but that's as low as I can go. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand you're trying to make a living, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $130?

I can see you're really interested in the product, and I appreciate that. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $140 and $130, so I can offer you $135. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still trying to stay within budget. Would you be willing to consider $115?

I understand you're really trying to stick to your budget, but I have to make a profit. I'm willing to compromise again, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I can offer you $125. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm really trying to stay within budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $105?

I'm starting to think we're getting a bit too far apart. I'm willing to make one more compromise, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I can offer you $120, which is my absolute lowest price. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm really trying to stay within budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $108?
